How many people are affected by Char syndrome ?,"Char syndrome is rare, although its exact incidence is unknown. Only a few families with this condition have been identified worldwide.",GHR,Char syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Char syndrome ?,"Mutations in the TFAP2B gene cause Char syndrome. This gene provides instructions for making a protein known as transcription factor AP-2. A transcription factor is a protein that attaches (binds)
